About.paragraph: Looking to improve your business operations but not sure where to turn? Need help planning or executing your next project? Let us guide you. Any organization can move forward with small incremental changes but building for the future in todayâ€™s rapidly evolving environment means taking bold chances and making insightful decisions. Our staff has decades of combined experience. Let our experts guide you to achieving the best ROI from your investment in the Microsoft 365 platform.
About.paragraph2: As one of the fastest growing and most robust collaboration platforms in the world, Microsoft 365 offers a range of apps and tools that can help streamline your business operations and communication.
About.paragraph3: Planning and having a clear vision for the platform is vital to being successful with Microsoft 365. Let our experts guide and support you during that process.

Services.name: Microsoft 365 for Small Business Owners
Services.text: This class is designed to help small business owners understand the features and capabilities of the Microsoft 365 platform, and put those tools to use for their business. Business owners will gain a great understanding of how the system works and how to leverage those tools to benefit their business.
Services.description: In this class you learn about all of the tools available to you and your business and how to best leverage those tools. Clients will receive lectures on the biggest topics, live demos by the instructor as well as hands on labs during class.
Services.italics: This class also includes a 1 hour follow up call with a member of our Client Services team after class. During this call you can discuss your current needs and get guidance on your Microsoft 365 setup, design, or operations.

moreInfoData.title: Working with SharePoint Lists and Libraries
subPoints: Creating SharePoint Pages to Drive Engagement

moreInfoData.title: Business Process Automation with Microsoft Power Automate (Flow)

Services.name: Microsoft 365 For Power Users
Services.text: This class is designed for Power Users who will be creating SharePoint sites, designing and implementing business processes, and doing day to day management of the Microsoft 365 environment. This class is for those students who already have a good foundational knowledge of Microsoft 365.
Services.description: In this class you learn about all of the tools available to you and your business and how to best leverage those tools. Clients will receive lectures on the biggest topics, live demos by the instructor as well as hands on labs during class.

moreInfoData.title: Tracking Tasks and Projects with Planner

Services.name: Microsoft 365 for End Users
Services.text: This introductory class offers workers a quick ramp up to being skilled at SharePoint and other Microsoft 365 tools. This is the perfect class for those wanting to get a great foundational knowledge of SharePoint and Microsoft 365
Services.description: This class is designed for those users who are new to the Microsoft 365 platform or those who are looking to increase their base knowledge of the system. The main focus of this class is how SharePoint works as the backbone of the Microsoft 365 platform. Users will gain knowledge on working with documents in SharePoint libraries and how to work with data stored in SharePoint lists.

moreInfoData.title: Working with Data in SharePoint Lists
